## DimensionsOptions interface

An object describing customization for the dimensions feature.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DimensionsOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [errorWhenNotFound](./react-native-webshell.dimensionsoptions.errorwhennotfound.md) | boolean | When no elements are found matching the providing tag, should the script raise an error? |
|  [tagName](./react-native-webshell.dimensionsoptions.tagname.md) | string | The element to target when the DOM is loaded. |
